185886124.review: Basically Command & Conquer 3 with better graphics and a more realistic storyline. As of writing review this, yes like in the game, it is the year 2025. If you are suffering with getting a framerate then please do not skip through the automatic graphics detector option. Just because you can run any RTS is decent settings from this era of games, doesn't mean that you can max out all of the settings to maximum. I am writing this review for the original Act of Aggression game. Also, I looked it up, Mexico does not actually possess Nuclear Arms due to an act that made Central America/ Caribbean Islands nuclear-free aside from nuclear technology. This act was known as The Treaty of Tlatelolco (or The Treaty for the Prohibition of Nuclear Arms in Latin America and the Caribbean) which was signed in Mexico City on February 14th 1967. So basically, if we wanted to we could easily take Mexico in the current year of 2025 (that was a joke).

185415138.review:
Ce jeu, bien que très beau, fonctionne aussi bien que le parti libéral.

Multijoueur désynchronisé, on peut jouer mais chaque joueurs dans une réalité parallèle!

Obligé de créer un maudit compte Eugraine Systems.

Compte qui est aussi utile qu'un toit ouvrant sur un sous-marin vu que ça fonctionne pas.

Devrait s'appeler ReBooze Edition.

183665454.review: Excelente jogo, pena que não foi continuado.
